title: Clash feedback
body:
Hello guys (this wont be according to request requirements)
I just want to know where can i give some Clash feedback :) ?

replies.body: Hop right on over to the [**Clash Discord**](https://discord.gg/league-clash-beta)! They have a room dedicated to feedback, and the Rioters have been answering questions pretty regularly as well ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8k13Vjfd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-19T02:22:32.068+0000)
>
> Hop right on over to the [**Clash Discord**](https://discord.gg/league-clash-beta)! They have a room dedicated to feedback, and the Rioters have been answering questions pretty regularly as well ^_^

Well thank you friend :)
